i18n.key: baseline of the element aligned with the baseline of its parent
baseline of the element aligned with the subscript-baseline of its parent
baseline of the element aligned with the superscript-baseline of its parent
top of the element aligned with the top of the parent element's font
bottom of the element aligned with the bottom of the parent element's font
middle of the element aligned with the middle of the lowercase letters in the parent
top of the element aligned with the top of the entire line
bottom of the element aligned with the bottom of the entire line
